tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to her on the recommendation of my friend and I made the best decision. Dr. Mamta is a very friendly and a thorough personality. She is very confident about the things you ask her. I liked how she explained me about PCOS and the detailed check up she did. A very patient listener and the progressive mind that she has really comforted me. She listened to me without any judgements and that made me more transparent with her. I recommend her over and over again for all your gynae related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She really explained everything in good way and explained why she is advising anything. Now I am aware very well that if I go with advise what benefit/harm can happen and if not go with advise what benefit / harm can happen..
It was a nice experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We met Dr. Mamta goel while we were searching for a doctor for my second pregnancy and we are glad that we met her.  She is very humble and supportive. Her guidence and support was what we needed in our this beautiful journey. I have visited Dr. Mamta number of times, and the way she explains the problem and possible solutions, I have never seen any doctor explain and discuss the same way. She is extremely knowledgeable and updated ! We highly recommend dr. Mamta goel for a smooth and fearless pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wish I had the words to thank her. I felt very confident after discussing my problem with her. She understood my concerns and explained me very well. She is very caring and empathetic. I would highly recommend her to anyone facing gynae problems.
